series.title: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
series.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Client Management
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: If you're struggling to find a system of communication with your clients or collaborators, this minisode is for you. We're sharing our tips for finding a system of working with others that's outside of just email communication.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #113 - Navigating Your Roles to Find Your Sweet Spot with Prim'd Marketing
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Jenni Brown and Sophie Davis of Prim'd Marketing share the ins and outs of business partnerships when it comes to navigating your roles in a partnership and finding your sweet spot in roles, boundaries, and work/life balance.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Non-Business Favorites
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Today's minisode is a fun one. We're talking about our favorite non-business podcasts, books, and resources that we love to indulge in. Because being boss doesn't mean you have to be all business all the time.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #112 - Creativity Comes First with Laura Tremaine
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Laura Tremaine (aka The Hollywood Housewife) is joining us today to talk all about creativity and being creative even if you’re not monetizing (yet) by following your own rules of how your creativity thrives.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Connecting Before Conferences
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: As you're gearing up for business vacations, retreats, and conferences this year, we're sharing tips for connecting with speakers and attendees ahead of time to build relationships and get on someone's radar who you might admire.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #111 - Marie Forleo on Productivity & Intuition
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Marie Forleo, founder of B-School, is on the Being Boss Podcast talking all about intuition, productivity secrets, and daily habits & rituals for being a successful creative entrepreneur and business owner—from getting in the boss mindset to taking care of your physical wellness.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Know Your Numbers
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: What do you do when you're freaking out about money even if you're making a good amount of money in your business? We're sharing tips on how to really know your numbers and get your spending under control so you don't feel like you're living invoice to invoice.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #110 - F*ck Fear with Jay Pryor
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Jay Pryor is joining us to talk about facing your fears and what to do when your worst fears come true because, as bosses, most of the time those things that we're afraid of are all just in our heads.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - How to Get Clients to Respect Your Time
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: How do you get clients to respect your time as a creative entrepreneur? In today's minisode, we're sharing how to set those firm boundaries and expectations so that you can have positive relationships with your clients that still allow you to be in control of your own time.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #109 - Packaging, Positioning, and Process with Tara Street
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Tara Street, Kathleen's sister and co-owner at Braid Creative, is joining us again today. We're digging how to package your offering, how to position your brand & business, and how to establish a process that you can repeat with your dream clients to make you feel boss.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Experimenting with Tiered Pricing
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Is tiered pricing the way to go if you feel like your full pricing is too high for some clients you want to work with? How can you create packaging for your offering that allows you to work with dreamy clients while still preserving the integrity of your business? We're sharing our thoughts on how to experiment with tiered pricing as well as some questions to ask yourself to make sure you're doing it for the right reasons.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #108 - Leaving the Day Job
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Is it time to leave your day job? Today we're talking to all our bosses who are side hustling their business while working the day job. We're sharing our tips for how to get in the right mindset, develop the right habits and routines, get your money in order, and create an action plan to actually take the leap and take your side hustle full time.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - What If I'm Not a Hustler?
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: What happens if you have a dream to be your own boss and you want that fulfilling, creative freedom that comes from setting your own working hours, but you're not sure that you have what it takes to have the self-discipline and the hustle to go at is as your own boss? In today's minisode, we're sharing our tips for how to test the boss waters to see if you have what it truly takes.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #107 - Meet Emily & Kathleen
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: At over 100 episodes in and with so many new listeners, we thought we'd take a moment to reintroduce ourselves, share what we stand for and what makes us tick as creative entrepreneurs, and of course reveal some random, silly, and maybe never-before-shared facts about ourselves.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Nerd Out Real Hard
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: What happens if you want to shift focus in your creative career and move into website design and development? In today's minisode we have a listener who is wondering what it takes to become a website developer and how to fill in the holes in her skillset.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #106 - Being a Working Creative with Nicole Elle
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Nicole Elle is a celebrity makeup artist and working creative, so we're talking with her today about the journey of makeup artistry and making a name for yourself as a freelance artist or being represented by an agency.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Communicating Price Increases to Your Clients
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: How do you communicate price increases to existing clients so that you can level up your business? In today's minisode, we're sharing tips on how to raise your prices and manage existing clients' expectations at the same time.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #105 - Behaving Like a Boss
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Behaving like a boss even when you don't feel like a boss is one of the most important things creative entrepreneurs can do to continue doing the work that builds a successful business. So today we're talking about what goes into those behaviors.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Keeping Momentum After Conferences
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: How do you keep the momentum going after an amazing conference? We're sharing our tips for following up with connections you've made and for creating action from the ideas and insights you learn at the conference.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #104 - End of Year Prompts
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: It's time to reflect on 2016! We're here with some prompts to consider what worked, what didn't work, and what to change in your business in order to look forward and continue being boss in 2017.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - How to Increase Visibility
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: How to you gain visibility online for your creative business? We're sharing our best time for showing up in front of potential clients in a way that's more than just about the numbers.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #103 - Pricing & Money Management
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Let's get specific about money management. Today we're getting really nitty gritty with how to manage your finances as a creative entrepreneur—from tracking profit to planning launches to saving for retirement.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - How Are You Being Compensated?
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: What if you don't feel confident about charging for your services? We always believe that you need to be compensated in some way, and while our first piece of advice will always be to clearly communicate an actual monetary price, there are other ways to be compensated for your work. In this minisode—live from Freshbooks headquarters in Toronto—we're sharing how to confidently make money from your side hustle.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #102- Defining Success
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: What does success really mean and how do you define success in your business? Today we're continuing the conversation from our episode on success without sacrifice with Jenny Shih by really digging into these questions and learning how to measure success.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - How to Make the Leap
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: How do you make the jump from full-time to freelance? Today's minisode comes from our live Being Boss event at Freshbooks headquarters in Toronto and we're sharing our tips for making the big leap to take your business full-time.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #101 - Putting Your Money Where Your Happy Is with Sarah Von Bargen
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Sarah Von Bargen, a blogger and writer who believes that yes is more fun than no is joining us today on Being Boss. She helps her readers and clients find more money and more happiness and make their more interesting and intentional. So we're talking with her about making an intentional shift in your business and making intentional choices on spending money in what makes you happy.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Business Advice for First-Time Moms
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Business advice for first-time moms who are juggling a creative business and a new baby. Today's minisode comes from our live Being Boss event at Freshbooks headquarters in Toronto and we're sharing our tips for creative entrepreneurs who are also venturing into motherhood but don't want to give up their businesses.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #100 - Best of Being Boss
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: This is our 100th episode of Being Boss!! So we thought we'd take a look back at some of our favorite Being Boss moments and episodes thus far. We're sharing behind-the-scenes thoughts from talking to some of our favorite guests and things that might have changed since those recordings. Plus, we've got all new episode music!

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Investing in Tools & Services
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Which tools and services should you invest in for your creative business when you're first starting out as a creative entrepreneur? Today's Being Boss minisode comes from our live Being Boss event at Freshbooks headquarters in Toronto.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #99 - Dealing with Bullies in Business
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: How do you stay authentic in the face of bullies? We’re following up on the episode we recorded with Jasmine Star where we touched on the topic of authenticity and haters. We're diving deep in this topic of criticism (real and perceived) and talking about how we continue to show up as we are in our own businesses in spite of the feedback we receive.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Personality Tests for Business
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Personality tests are more than just for fun. In today's minisode we're sharing how personality tests help show you who you are and how you move throughout the world and throughout your business.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #98 - Your Inner Critic is a Big Jerk with Danielle Krysa
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Our first Being Boss guest ever, Danielle Krysa of The Jealous Curator and author of You Inner Critic is a Big Jerk is joining us again today. We're talking with Danielle about the creative mindset after you've taken the leap from your day job, the inner and outer critic, and finding the balance between taking your creative business seriously and having fun with your craft.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Dealing with Client Tension
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: How do you have difficult conversations with clients? Today's minisode is all about how to have those difficult conversations and deal with client tension.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #97 - Boundaries for Getting What You Want
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Today we're talking about boundaries—work/life boundaries, team boundaries, client boundaries, and energetic boundaries. We're sharing how boundaries allow us to work smarter not harder, and can even allow us to tap into our creativity on a whole new level.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Take a Chill Pill
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Today's minisode is all about the mindset of a creative entrepreneur and how to "take a chill pill" when you're stressing out about everything so that you can do the work.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #96 - Tarot in Business with Brigit Esselmont of Biddy Tarot
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: One of the things we've been surprised to find as we grow the Being Boss community is that so many of you are interested in tarot! One of our favorite resources for tarot is BiddyTarot.com, so today we decided to invite Brigit on the show to talk all about tarot and how you can use it as a tool for creativity in your business.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Responding to Emails
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Today's minisode is all about ways to manage your email or make it more fun as a creative entrepreneur. We're sharing ways we keep our inboxes out of control and eliminate the stress of responding to emails.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #95 - Success without Sacrifice with Jenny Shih
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Today we're talking with business and success coach, Jenny Shih about how to create a successful online business without having to work long hours or make huge sacrifices. We're digging in about how to find the balance between big vision and daily grind, sacrifice and success, and drive and gratitude, plus how to get past some of those mental blocks associated with money and guilt.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Collaborating with a Friend
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Today's minisode is all about collaborating and co-owning a business or a project with a friend—how partnerships and collaborations have helped us grow in our businesses, some pitfalls to avoid when working with a friend, and the advantages to teaming up in business and projects.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #94 - Money Mindset
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Today's episode comes from our Freshbooks Live in Toronto Being Boss event. Recorded live from the headquarters of our favorite accounting and invoicing system, there couldn't be a better place for us to talk about money. Money is the biggest stressor for creative entrepreneurs, so today we're talking about what to do when you're freaking out about money and how to get in the right money mindset.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Strategies for Handling & Fixing Mistakes in Business
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: How to handle and fix mistakes as your own boss. We're sharing some of the biggest mistakes we've made in our businesses and what you can do to move on when you inevitably make a mistake in your business.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #93 - Jasmine Star on Authenticity and Haters
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Jasmine Star is on Being Boss today! Jasmine became one of the most sought after photographers in California in 2007, and in 2009 she was named on of the top 10 wedding photographers in the world. This was only after starting her photography business in 2006. Now she provides coaching for other creative businesses so we've got a lot to talk about scaling a business, shifting focus, and dealing with that inner critic and haters.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Tips for Finding Your Business Bestie
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Today's minisode is all about growing creative friendships and finding your business bestie when you feel isolated as an online business owner.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #92 - Creating a Business Model with Tara Gentile
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Tara Gentile is joining us on the podcast again to talk about business models and creating a legacy business. We’ve been working with Tara in her mastermind group to plan for huge growth in Being Boss, so we’re talking about some of the problems we’ve faced, what we need to do to reach the goals we’ve set, and how wanting more is nothing to be ashamed of.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Would You Return to a Full-Time Job?
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: After being your own boss, would you return to a full-time job or at this point, are you completely unemployable—especially when you have a variety of skills and interests?

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #91 - Food Freedom Forever with Melissa Hartwig
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Melissa Hartwig, founder of the Whole30, is back on Being Boss to talk all about her new book on how to make a lifestyle that feels healthy, satisfying, and sustainable. Writing a book is a huge project, so we talk to Melissa about that creative process and how you can be sure you're healthy and taking care of yourself while doing it.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Finding the Faith to Persevere
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Today's minisode is all about how to find the faith to persevere and trust that it's all going to work out as well as how to get great photos to use for your brand.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #90 - Side-Hustling Your Creative Career with Beryl Ayn Young
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary:
What does it take to shift from your day job to your side hustle—especially as a working mom? In today's episode, we've got our friend, Beryl Ayn Young joining us to share her journey.

Topics discussed in this episode:
-What should you be known for vs. what you actually want to be known for
-When your passion project has to take a backseat
-Finding the permission and confidence to be creative
-Shifting from a day job to your side hustle being your full-time job
-The return on investment with coaching/masterminding
-Balancing work and life as a working mom
-Finding structure in working for yourself

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - How to Encourage Team Member Initiative
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: How do you encourage your team member initiative and creating a friendly, collaborative environment with your employees and team members? In today's minisode, we're giving our best tips and tactics for fostering a creative, collaborative environment for your employees and contractors.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #89 - When Your Metrics Suck
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: How do you use your metrics and analytics for your online business? In today's episode, we're talking about what to do when your metrics suck and how to create content that gets good metrics and traffic. We're talking about what we do for Being Boss, what we're planning to up our game for Being Boss, and our tips for how to read and use your analytics for your online business.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Asking for Help in Running Your Business
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: How do you ask for help in running your business? In today's minisode, we talk about the different ways we have asked for help in our own businesses and the kind of impacts that work has done—for both our businesses and our relationships.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #88 - Prioritizing Relationships in Work + Life
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Today’s episode is all about relationships—making friends, sustaining and maintaining relationships with your partners, being a mom, and networking.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - How to Keep up Momentum While Unplugging
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Today's minisode is all about how to keep up momentum in your business while you're unplugging—especially if you're on vacation or even taking a maternity leave.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #87 - Mixing Friends and Business with Shauna Haider and Gala Darling
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Shauna Haider and Gala Darling on being business besties, balancing friendship and business when you go into business with a friend, doing what you believe in (despite the haters), and how to make friends as an adult.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - How to Set Up a Productive Workspace
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Today's minisode is all about how to set up a productive workspace. We're sharing how our own workspaces have evolved over time and things we like in our environment to put us in the boss mindset and do the work.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #86 - Being Boss for Makers and Artists Nicole Stevenson
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary:
Today's episode is for makers and artists. We're talking with illustrator, artist, writer, and co-founder of Dear Handmade Life, Nicole Stevenson. We dive into pricing your products, making money as an artist, and that when you go into a business as an artist or maker, you're selling more than just your art.

-Nicole's entrepreneurial journey (3:06)
-Pricing your products as an artist or maker (14:20)
-Putting the burden of making money on your art (19:03)
-How to "give it all away" as a maker / product-based business (23:42)
-Selling a lifestyle/story/feeling vs. strictly selling a product (27:49)
-The importance of artists and creative thinking (31:27)
-Scaling as a maker (36:05)
-How to hold yourself accountable to your art (43:34)

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - What is a Smart Way to Invest When You're Just Getting Started?
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Today's minisode is all about how to finance a launch and where to invest your money when you're just getting started.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #85 - Organizing and Attending Conferences & Retreats with Kristy Oustalet
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary:
Today we want to talk about conferences, retreats, and the importance of OFFLINE connections! We're talking about what it takes to put on your own conference or retreat – and we thought we’d invite our friend Kristy Oustalet on to chat with us about this. We first met Kristy when she attended our very first Being Boss Vacation in NOLA. She runs her own conference in New Orleans called VenturePOP and offered some generous guidance to us newbies that we want to share with you all!

Topics discussed in this episode:

-The importance of connecting offline with other creatives
-Our favorite conferences and retreats
-How to get the most out of a conference
-Dealing with conferences as an introvert
-Starting your own conference or meetup
-Scaling a meetup
-What to avoid doing at conferences and meetups
-Making a profit on conferences and sponsorships

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Tactics & Ideas for Your Summer Slump
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Today's minisode is all about how to get out of that summer slump. Kathleen here for a solo-minisode and I'm talking about what I'm feeling today which is: I'm in a summer slump. So I'm brainstorming some actionable ideas to help you (and me) get out of that summertime slump.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #84 - Little Steps to Big Change with Katie Lee
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary:
Today we're talking to lifestyle designer and self-published author, Katie Lee, all about how to design a beautiful, simplified everyday life that helps you feel more satisfied, fulfilled, and ultimately—boss! We're also digging into what it takes to self-publish a book and what you can learn about yourself and your business through the book writing process.

-Your daily life is your whole life philosophy (6:42)
-Methodical approach to simplifying your life (10:52)
-How to make the daily grind more beautiful (15:00)
-How to continually live with gratitude and not become desensitized (20:21)
-Creating a home and life that supports your dreams and goals (25:38)
-How to keep from getting overwhelmed when you're embracing change (41:48)
-Self-publishing a book (50:20)

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs

So we're walking through our launch experience, how we made decisions for the new Being Boss website, what we did to market it, and how to commit to your launch—like a boss.

This is something that we've had to do a lot behind the scenes here at Being Boss, so we thought we'd get really open and vulnerable about how to partner up in your business and lay out all the legal aspects, defining roles, and answering the "what-ifs."

Jason is a personal trainer and lifestyle coach, and since you know that we love to occasionally geek out about fitness—especially when it parallels the journey of creatives—we’re going to be talking to him about fitness, lifestyle, and being a creative entrepreneur.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs

But today – we’re just going to have a real conversation with Meg about motherhood, being a literal boss of employees, and manifesting what you want.

She's talking with us about finding your voice, why writing is important, making time to create content, how to get past creative blocks, and what to do when you feel like nobody is listening. Erica Midkiff is a content coach who helps creatives listen to and trust themselves so they can share what they know with those who need to hear it most.

Ramit Sethi is the author of the New York Times bestseller, I Will Teach You To Be Rich and writes for over 500,000 monthly readers on his website where he covers psychology, personal finance, careers, and entrepreneurship. He's jamming with us today on what it really means to live a rich life and how to manage your creative ideas to create quality, profitable products and services that can stand the test of time.

episodes.title: #56 - Owning Your Creative Expertise with Tara Street
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Today we're excited to have Kathleen's sister and business partner for Braid Creative, Tara Street. We're talking all about owning your creative expertise—whether you're a boss on a team or THE boss of your own business—so that you can assure your clients and not have to start over from scratch with each new project. Tara is a master at helping clients find and own their expertise, and she's even sharing a script you can use to help you feel more boss.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #55 - Playing Big with Tara Mohr
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: This week we're welcoming Tara Mohr, an expert on women’s leadership and well-being. Tara helps women play bigger in sharing their voices and bringing forward their ideas in work and in life. Tara's book, Playing Big: Practical Wisdom for Women Who Want to Speak Up, Create, and Lead, named a best book of the year by Apple’s iBooks (and we highly recommend it too!), shares her model for making the journey from playing small—being held back by fear and self-doubt—to playing big, taking bold action to pursue what you see as your callings. Tara takes a unique approach that blends inner work and practical skills training and she joins us this week to share her knowledge to our bosses on Being Boss.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #54 - Managing Clients
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Today we're jamming on client relationships for creative entrepreneurs – everything from firing a client from hell to keeping the dream clients well … dreamy. This episode is going to be great for any of you service-based creatives who rely on clients for a paycheck, and for any creative entrepreneurs who are struggling with defining their process, laying out their contracts, and creating expectations.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #53 - The Value of Staying Small
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Today we’re chatting about the pros and cons of what it means to stay small in your business. Now at the beginning of the New Year we hear so many creatives talk about growing, and expanding, and increasing their social media presence and followers, but at the same time finding more intimacy and a close-knit community in their business and brand. So we're really digging into what it means to stay small vs. what it means to grow your business, and how you can maybe even have the best of both worlds.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #52 - New Years Resolutions
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Today we’re talking about New Years resolutions, what went well in 2015, what sucked, and what we’re looking forward to accomplishing in 2016. We decided to bring on our boss boyfriends, Paul Jarvis and Jason Zook, to chat with us about this topic!

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #51 - Getting Witchy with Carolyn Elliott
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Carolyn Elliott of Bad Witches Magazine is joining us today to help us indulge our woo woo side. We found Carolyn in our Being Boss Facebook group when she posted a link to an article she wrote on Medium about her bizarre philosophies that helped her go from seriously broke to her first 5-figure month being her own boss. So today Carolyn is talking with us about her philosophy on money and about what it means to be a witch and practice magic.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #50 - Meet Edgar with Laura Roeder
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Laura Roeder, founder of Edgar—a new social media automation tool designed to prevent updates from going to waste—is joining us today on the Being Boss podcast to talk about harnessing the power of social media marketing and giving your content the attention it deserves.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #49 - Self Care and Herbal Medicine with Lindsay Kluge
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Herbalist and nutrition expert, Lindsay Kluge of Ginger Tonic Botanicals, is joining us today on Being Boss to talk about herbal medicine, the mind-body connection, and self-care. Because even as you're doing the work to be boss, it's important to make sure you're treating your body right too!

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #48 - Boss Integrity with Jay Pryor
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Kathleen has mentioned him countless times in previous episodes, so this week we're excited to welcome life coach, Jay Pryor on the Being Boss podcast to talk about some of his coaching techniques and the valuable lessons he uses to help his coaching clients on living with integrity and being impeccable with your word.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #47 - You Need a Budget with Jesse Mecham
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: This week we're joined by Jesse Mecham, the founder of YouNeedABudget.com. We're getting real about budgeting your money for both your business and your personal life, but also shifting your mindset so it's not a scary thing. Jesse shares the emotional aspect of money, and creating awareness around your bank account.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #46 - Finding Focus in Your Creative Business
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Many creatives are talented or interested in LOTS of things. Or some creatives know they have a creative spirit, but feel like a jack of all trades / master of none. So today we’re talking about finding your creative focus and how to shift your focus if you want to change directions or add more to the mix.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #45 - The Golden Egg with David Heinemeier Hansson
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: David Heinemeier Hansson - creator of Ruby on Rails, founder and CTO at Basecamp, and best selling author is joining us today on the Being Boss podcast to talk about finding the "golden egg" in your business and improving your odds to build something successful.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #44 - Creativity & Magic
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: After coming back from our boss vacation in New Orleans, we're talking about the magic we experienced when a group of creative bosses get together and how we can apply that magic to our businesses and everyday lives through making time for play and through realizing that sometimes it just has to be the right time for the magic to happen.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #43 - Live from NOLA
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Today we have a very special episode because we recorded LIVE in New Orleans with 75 other bosses and we’re going to be answering their questions quick fire style—about the future of Being Boss, getting a little woo woo in your business, hiring and keeping your team happy, and handling naysayers and negativity.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #42 - Brené Brown
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Today we're joined by Dr. Brené Brown, whom you might know from her TED talk on vulnerability, or her books Daring Greatly and more recently Rising Strong. Today she's talking with us about vulnerability as a creative, how to deal with the messy second act of rejection, perfectionism, and discomfort, and getting clear about whose opinions matter.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #41 - Social Media, Newsletters, and Content Marketing
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Should I have a newsletter? Should I be on Facebook? Should I be on Twitter? Should I be on Instagram? Should I be on Pinterest? Should I be blogging? Should I have a podcast? These are all things our listeners often ask us, so today we're digging into content marketing and give you some casual, practical advice on how to make it work for you as a boss.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #40 - Feeling Boss
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: We talk a lot about how to be boss in this podcast, but to day we're talking about feeling boss and what sorts of things we and our listeners do to put them in the boss mindset—from bright red lipstick to making big investments for yourself (like a new car) to feeling like a boss when you have employees

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #39 - Do What You Love with Brian Clark of Copyblogger
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Online marketing genius, Brian Clark of Rainmaker Digital (formerly CopyBlogger Media) and host of the Unemployable podcast, joins us this week to talk about online marketing and what it truly takes to grow a wildly successful business.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #38 - For Creatives Who Hate Selling with Jason Zook
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Today we're talking with our other boss boyfriend, Jason Zook. You might know Jason from the Invisible Office Hours podcast with Paul Jarvis or one of his many projects including selling advertising space on his body or selling his last name. Jason is talking with us about some of his projects and how to embrace what makes you different so that you can fuel your creative self.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #37 - Making Decisions Like A Boss
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Many creatives that we work with struggle with decision-making and saying no. Today we're discussing what to say no to and what to say yes to, narrowing in on your dream clients and offerings, making decisions about your creative path, and the boss power that comes with being a decision-maker.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #36 - Tommy Walker
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Today Tommy Walker of Shopify's Enterprise Ecommerce blog is joining us to talk about procrastination, feeling overwhelmed or scared, and how not to be a lazy entrepreneur without burning out by raising the bar, meeting your deadlines, not getting too precious about the work, and the importance of mentors.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #35 - How to Set Goals Like a Boss with Paul Jarvis
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: We're welcoming back our "Being Boss boyfriend," Paul Jarvis, to talk about setting goals and focusing on what you want (rather than on fear). And digging in deep to the different approaches and views when it comes to goal setting.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #34 - Building the Whole30 Empire with Special Guest Melissa Hartwig
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Have you ever wondered what it takes to run an empire like Whole30? We chatted with Whole30 founder and NYT best-selling author, Melissa Hartwig. We've got the exclusive, behind-the-scenes look at what it means to build an empire as a creative entrepreneur.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #33 -  Self Care For Mom Bosses with Special Guest Rebecca Egbert
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: To the working moms, mom-to-be’s, and mamapreneurs—this episode is for you! We’re talking with postpartum health expert Rebecca Egbert about self care—mentally, physically, emotionally, and spiritually—for mothers who are also boss.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #32 - Face Your Fears Like A Boss
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Here are the five biggest fears of creative entrepreneurs and the patterns of fear we've seen from the hundreds of creatives we coach and work with. We're getting specific about what we’re afraid of so that we can the find courage and clarity to get back to work like a boss.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #31 - How to Make the Daily Grind Dreamy
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: This week we're exploring how to make the daily grind a little more dreamy. Even though we love our jobs as creative entrepreneurs, we're no strangers to getting bogged down in the day-to-day unglamorous side of things. So we're talking about how to get in the right mindset with your dream job, so you can be more productive and happy too.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #30 - Being A Breadwinning Boss
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: We're answering a few questions from our Being Boss listeners—from what it feels like to be a working mom and the breadwinner of your family, to having successful business partnerships and managing personality conflicts.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #29 - Working From Home
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: As creative entrepreneurs, you (usually) get to choose where you want to work. So today we want to talk about the pros and cons of working from home and tips on how to establish work / life balance & boundaries so you can work from home like a boss.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #28 - Summer Vacation
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Emily and Kathleen talk about what they've been up to this summer and give you a little peek behind the curtain on how taking a vacation has affected business, and how they keep their business running even while they're away.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Jealousy and Competition
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Emily and Kathleen chat about how they turn feelings of jealousy and competition into feelings that drive motivation, admiration and friendship.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #27 - Organizing Like a Boss with Val Geisler
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Successful Creatives
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Kathleen chats about the characteristics and patterns that she sees in some of the most successful creatives she's come across.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #26 - Better Together with Lisa Congdon and Clay Walsh
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: What happens when you go into creative entrepreneurship with your significant other? And what about when you've established a business as a creative solopreneur and then ask your significant other to quit a dreamy job and work with you? Today's episode gives us answers to these questions and more.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - 4 Questions
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Today we're following up on our Episode 25 podcast with Brooke Castillo on the "4 question turn around." What's it all about? Loosening your grip on negative thoughts.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #25 - Your Capacity to Have with Brooke Castillo
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Brooke Castillo joins Emily and Kathleen on Being Boss to talk about her coaching philosophy and help us expand our minds to allow abundance into our lives.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Cultivating Confidence
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: This week's minisode is an exclusive look at our first secret episode released to our subscribers only a few months ago, and it's all about cultivating confidence in your life and biz.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #24 -  How to Fall in Love with Your Business with Jennifer Dopazo
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: If you're are feeling overwhelmed by your to-do lists or by what you should be doing or supposed to be doing for your dream job, we're welcoming guest, Jennifer Dopazo to help us give you advice on how to fall back in love with your business by carving out your own business path and finding your way through passion projects.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Mindfulness, Boundaries, and Rules
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #23 - Giving It All Away
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Today's topic is content sharing, social media, and our philosophy of giving it all away in a way that helps you set yourself up as a creative expert so you can Be Boss and attract dreamy clients.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Mantras
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: In this episode, Kathleen explains the power of using mantras and journaling to grow your business with focus.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #22 - Finding the Confidence to Invest in Your Business with Talia Chai
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Talia is a Braid Method and IndieBOOM dream client who is a nutritionist and a wellness, health, and beauty coach to help her clients live a happier, healthier, and more beautiful life through health, lifestyle, and wellness changes. We wanted to introduce you to someone who has recently just leveled up their game to give some insight on Being Boss in the beginning stages of creative entrepreneurship.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Passive Income
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary:
Passive income is a great way for creative entrepreneurs to earn extra income "while you sleep." In this minisode, Emily and Kathleen discuss their experiences with passive income, and the truth about what's involved in making money with passive income streams of revenue.
Join our Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/beingboss/

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #21 - Finding Your Chief Initiative with Tara Gentile
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: In this episode of Being Boss, Emily and Kathleen welcome special guest, Tara Gentile. Tara is a business strategist and coach for creative entrepreneurs to help them grow their influence in a way that works toward your unique communication strengths. She's also the author of The Art of Earning,  The Art of Growth, and Quiet Power Strategy.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Living Spaces
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: In this minisode, Kathleen shares tips on how to create living spaces that energize you and feed your creative energy.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #20 - Push Goals with Special Guest Chalene Johnson
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: In this episode of Being Boss, Emily and Kathleen welcome special guest, Chalene Johnson, the fitness celebrity behind TurboFire and PiYo as well as the voice behind podcasts The Chalene Show and Build Your Tribe. Chalene is also a NYT best selling author, motivational speaker, and is the CEO of her business and lifestyle coaching company, Team Johnson.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - 4 Tips to Destress Your Life and Work Happier
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: In this minisode, Kathleen shares some of her and Emily's favorite tips for managing stress as an entrepreneur, so they can love their life and work happier.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #19 - Communicate Like A Boss
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: In this episode of Being Boss, Emily and Kathleen talk about communication – whether it’s in-person, over Skype, via email, on the telephone or even text. We cover managing your inbox and writing effective emails to talking about phone phobias and the best way to handle miscommunications.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Investment Property, Homeschooling, and Bodybuilding
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: In this minisode, Emily and Kathleen answer personal reader questions about everything from Kathleen's investments in rental property, Emily's homeschooling, bodybuilding, and their favorite cocktails.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #18 - Collaborate Like a Boss
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: In this episode of Being Boss, Emily and Kathleen talk about creative collaboration and partnering up. We've both had creative collaborations in the past and are obviously collaborating with Being Boss, so we're taking you through the steps of what it takes to create a successful, dreamy partnership that works.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - The Fear of Judgement
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: In this episode, Kathleen shares some practical tips and techniques for dealing with the fear of judgement.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #17 - How to Sell Your Creative Work with Sales Coach Kendrick Shope
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary:
Kendrick Shope is a sales boss who works with creative entrepreneurs to give them the tools, knowledge, and support they need to up-level their sales abilities, so that they can sell more, make more money, and do more of what they love.

In this episode we're talking about how to sell your product or service as a creative entrepreneur.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Podcasts We're Digging
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: In this minisode, Kathleen and Emily share their current favorite podcasts.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #16 - Launching and Running a Debt-Free Business
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: In this episode of Being Boss, Emily and Kathleen talk about how they build successful businesses with little money and NO investors because as much as they believe in investing in your business and hiring talent to help your business, you shouldn't have to spend cash you don't have.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - What We're Reading
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: In this minisode, Emily and Kathleen share a few of their favorite books for being boss.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #15 - Finding Your Rat People with Paul Jarvis
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary:
In this episode of Being Boss, Emily and Kathleen welcome Paul Jarvis, a web designer who has worked with big deals like Marie Forleo, The Highline in New York, and Mercedes-Benz.

He’s a best selling author and his books include Be Awesome at Online Business, The Good Creative, and he’s even written a vegan cookbook. You may know Paul from his newsletter called The Sunday Dispatch or his podcast called Invisible Office Hours.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - How to Hire a Coach
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: In this minisode, Kathleen and Emily discuss important factors to keep in mind when choosing to hire a coach to help you up-level your life or your biz.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #14 - Redefining the Dream Job with Elise and Scott Grice
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: In this episode of Being Boss, Emily and Kathleen welcome Elise and Scott Grice from Hey, Sweet Pea. Elise and Scott are online educators and coaches helping creative entrepreneurs redefine what success means to them so they live a dream life according to their own definition.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Sticking to Your Ideal Client
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: In this minisode, Kathleen and Emily answer a listener question regarding how to always work with your ideal client, and only do projects you love.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #13 - The Jealous Curator with Special Guest Danielle Krysa
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: In this episode of Being Boss, Emily and Kathleen welcome their first guest, Danielle Krysa of TheJealousCurator.com who shares her experiences with self-doubt and that criticizing voice we each have in our heads as well as her journey of using that self-doubt to fuel her success.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Naming Your Business
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: In this minisode, Kathleen and Emily talk about naming your business or blog, the evolution of your brand, and how to build a website and/or blog for your business and personal brand.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #12 - How to Be Boss Even When You Feel Like A Fraud
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: In this episode of Being Boss, Emily and Kathleen talk about feeling like a fraud, falling into the comparison trap, and coping with perfectionism.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Blogging About Money
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: In this minisode, Emily and Kathleen share some feedback regarding a reader request regarding hesitations about blogging about her dream, and how money fits in.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #11 - Get Paid Like a Boss
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: In this episode of Being Boss Emily and Kathleen talk about getting paid – from the nitty gritty logistics of collecting money to getting in the right mindset to get paid like a boss without feeling guilty about it.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - What to Do When You Can't Afford Branding
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: In this minisode, Kathleen jams on ways you can begin building and designing your brand if you can't yet afford to hire a professional.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #10 - Personal Branding
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: In this episode of Being Boss, Kathleen shares why it’s important for creative entrepreneurs to blend who they are with what they do.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Self-Care
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: In this minisode, Kathleen and Emily jam on how to convince yourself of the importance of self-care, and how to step into it so that you can be a healthy, thriving boss.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #9 - How To Do Like A Boss
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: In this episode of Being Boss, Kathleen and Emily share how they organize their to-do lists and actually get it done.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Bosses Don't Indulge Guilt
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Kathleen jams on how to deal with guilt, so that you can stop worrying and start being boss.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #8 - Being Boss and Being Mom
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Being boss and being a parent is no picnic. In today’s episode of Being Boss Kathleen and Emily share how they manage being boss while also being working moms. This episode is for new parents, and creative entrepreneurs who are thinking about starting a family, but don’t know how they’ll manage it all.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: MINISODE - Make Your Customers Trust and Buy You
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: In this first mini-episode of Being Boss, Emily dives deeper into the concept of "Consistency Breeds Legitimacy" and what that means for your online business, including how it can help you land some dreamy dream customers

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #7 - Your Website is Your Most Valuable Employee
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: In this episode of Being Boss Kathleen asks Emily (website expert extraordinaire) all things web and how creative entrepreneurs can make little (and big) shifts in their site to attract more dream clients and get more business.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #6 - Staying Motivated and Happy
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: In today’s episode of Being Boss Emily and Kathleen share ways you can stay happy and motivated to do the work through a cold winter (or during a summer slump).

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #5 - Grow Your Business Even When You're on Vacation
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: In this episode of Being Boss Emily and Kathleen teach you how to be boss, and even grow your business when you’re on vacation or even an extended maternity leave. We’re going to talk about why vacation is important for the creative entrepreneur and how to grow your team so they can do the work even when you’re out living the dream.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #4 - How to Be Boss When You're Afraid of Failing
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: In this episode of Being Boss Emily and Kathleen discuss the fear of failure, not having enough experience, leaping from the day job to the self-made dream job, and bridging the gap between where you are and where you want to be.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #3 - Redefining Professional
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: In this episode Kathleen and Emily talk about what it means to be professional and making your own rules when you are your own boss.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #2  - What To Do When You're Freaking Out About Money
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: In the second episode of Being Boss Emily and Kathleen discuss the thing most creatives are afraid to think about, much less talk about – MONEY. Specifically, what to do when you’re freaking out about money.

episodes.seriesTitle: Being Boss: Mindset, Habits, Tactics, and Lifestyle for Creative Entrepreneurs
episodes.title: #1 - Do the Work
episodes.author: Emily Thompson and Kathleen Shannon
episodes.summary: Welcome to our very first episode of Being Boss – a podcast for creative entrepreneurs. In this episode Kathleen and Emily share a little background on our journey to becoming friends and creative powerhouses in our businesses. The theme of this episode is all about "doing the work". In other words, going from being just a creative to being a creative entrepreneur.
